Description: Four beads, one barrel-shaped bead made of faience, no glaze preserved anymore, three disc-shaped beads made of ostrich eggshell, two are better smoothed, one is quite irregularly shaped.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2, upper levels
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
